mapper.select:
select
from shop_product_info
where (name like CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%') OR keywords like CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%') OR sku like CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%'))
order by ${pageQuery.orderBy} ${pageQuery.orderType} limit #{pageQuery.start} , #{pageQuery.pageSize}

select count(*) from shop_product_info
where (name like CONCAT('%',CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%'),'%') OR keywords like CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%') OR sku like CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%'))
